website_summaries.verdict: A fun and easy way to teach kids how to crochet.
pros: Durable, plastic crochet hooks are safe for kids to use
Included instruction manual is clear and easy to follow
Kit comes with 7 different colors of yarn, two crochet hooks, and one plastic needle
Sits at a low price point
cons: Included yarn is quite thin and basic

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth Purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this kit was not “easy to do.” The instructions used detailed pictures to explain the steps but asked the user to jump around in the manual to accomplish different stages in the process and left some details out that a novice would not have known on their own. Ultimately, I had to ask an expert to show me the steps. Another problem was found with the yarn vs crochet hook. The thread was very thin and light-weight and easily fell apart while working with the bulky crochet hook. There was really nothing of value in this kit aside from the instructions, which would likely be found in any crochet book. Not a good buy at any price.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Beginners Crochet Kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old for Christmas. Being that I just had a baby, I didn't have the patience to teach her how to crochet. She was excited to receive this gift. The crochet hooks are a light plastic, not great quality. Yarn is okay. The instructions however were terrible. The instructions confused my 8 year old, and after careful review... I ended up teaching her myself.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Confusing Directions / Cheap Plastic Needle
customer_reviews.text: Directions seem to skip important steps for beginners. My niece, her Grandma and I were all unable to follow the booklet. We had to find directions on-line. Plastic hook/needle is unuseable. The plastic snags and separates yarn. I attempted to file the nubs off but it still catches. (as a beginner I may be wrong on the needle/hook being clunky but that is my uneducated opinion) I purchased this as a gift for my niece and I was very disappointed and a little embarrassed to send such a low quality gift. She had to buy new crochet hooks which worked MUCH better.
customer_reviews.author: RLR

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Easy for me and my 7 year old daughter to learn to crochet. Came with everything you need to learn. Bought my daughter more yarn because she wanted to keep crocheting. Definitely recommend if you don't know how or need a refresher crocheting!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Devine

customer_reviews.title: Not for beginners if no one in the house knows how to crochet
customer_reviews.text: At first glance it looked like a good kit until my 12 year old started. The first problem was the plastic hooks (purple in pic) the hook bit didn’t hook the yarn like it should it would slip right off (blue hook we bought local for 1.38). Once she had a proper crochet hook she did much better. The instructions are ok but not for true beginners...my daughter said “the directions aren’t very clear after a few steps in...i think it would make sense to people who have done it before but not to someone who never has....they should have had someone who never crocheted try it with no help”.
customer_reviews.author: R. Webb

customer_reviews.title: She did love receiving it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 8 year old nieces birthday. She said it was really hard and couldn't even get it started after reading the instructions with her mom. She did love receiving it
customer_reviews.author: Satori

customer_reviews.title: Still would buy again...just for the book alone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 year old step daughter who is just starting to learn how to crochet. Coming from someone who actually knows how to crochet, this kit is just "okay". First thing is the hooks are very hard to work with. Would be alot better if the hooks were metal and actually had the right cut out for the yarn. We ended up using a knife to fix the hooks but still. Second thing is the yarn is too thin for beginners. BUT the book and instructions are awesome great pictures and very clear directions. So over all she is happy. I have tons of yarn and hooks for her but I'm sure other may not.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Super fun for my neice
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my 9-year-old great niece. She loved it so much. It was challenging enough to keep her mind busy and her fingers working, but not so challenging that she stopped making it. Her mother did have to help her just a bit which added to the spirit of the holiday! She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It makes a nice gift to someone with no crochet experience.
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about this, but gave it full stars anyway. I bought this for my I year I'll old daughter, so for her, it might just be too complicated. I'm an avid crochet and knitter. I feel like the same concept could have been achieved with a beginner book, a ball of yarn, and a hook set. But for a convenient all in one box that you can wrap? It's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift. I bought this for my niece, she loved it. The shipping was extremely quick, which really suprized me. The contents are appropriate for the age levels indicated. I do feel more yarn could have been included, but I guess you get what you paid for. It's a good started kit, I recommend buying this for young crafters.
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: kit
customer_reviews.text: this product is a great help the instruction that it came with is excellent it went step by step and i like that so much...the box was filled with everything that you needed but one down fall i think it needed more colors of yarn in it but great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: so we sent this to her grandma's who is amazing at all things creative
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my nine year old and the directions seem a little tough, even for me, so we sent this to her grandma's who is amazing at all things creative, they pulled it off after some trial and error.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Too hard!
customer_reviews.text: It was so hard that we all got confused and put it away after the first hour. Haven't touched it since. I got so frustrated trying to help my kids that I decided to just do it myself---it did not go well. This is not easy or for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: mom2twins+1

customer_reviews.title: A Flop with my Granddaughters
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 10 and 11 year old granddaughters. Not a big hit. They struggled to make a chain and then gave up.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: The instructions are easy to follow and the yarn is wool and such ...
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are easy to follow and the yarn is wool and such nice bright colors. The projects are very nice. My 7 year old granddaughter loves finger crocheting and had no interest in learning how to use a crochet hook until she saw these projects and what was possible with a hook. Her desire to make the purse has supplied the motivation to learn how to make a chain and a single and double stitch which is all you need to know in order to make the projects. There is enough yarn for two projects.
customer_reviews.author: Bescal

customer_reviews.title: Not for beginners and not easy to do as the box suggests.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely NOT for beginners. The instructions are not detailed enough (not to mention incorrect grammar). We tried for hours and then finally decided to watch YouTube videos and so our own thing. You might as well buy the materials from Michaels.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjoy

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my 9 year old daughter busy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been experimenting various designs with it. I’ve been seeing her spending more than an hour daily weaving with it. Good stuff to keep kids busy and have them learn through.

product_meta.title: 4M 3625 Easy-To-Do Crochet Kit - DIY Arts & Crafts Yarn Gift for Kids & Teens, Boys & Girls
product_meta.description:
Explore the fun of crocheting with the 4M Crochet Art Kit. The Crochet Art Kit is a perfect beginner set to teach the fundamentals of crocheting. The kit includes two (2) crochet hooks, one (1) plastic needle and seven (7) colors of yarn. This kit contains enough materials to create three of the following items: coaster, handbag, place mat or belt. Includes a 14-page instruction book. Recommended for ages 8 years and up.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The 4M Crochet Art Kit is perfect for beginners. The kit includes 2 crochet hooks, one plastic needle, seven colors of yarn and a 14-page instruction booklet. Enough supplies to make 3 of the following items: coaster, handbag, placemat or belt. A hobby that will last a lifetime.
feature_bullets: The Crochet Art Kit is a perfect beginner set to teach the fundamentals of crocheting.
The kit includes two (2) crochet hooks, one (1) plastic needle and seven (7) colors of yarn.
This kit contains enough materials to create three of the following items: coaster, handbag, place mat or belt.
Recommended for ages 8 years and up.
Challenge your child's imagination with 4M toys and kits.
4M educational toys cover a wide range of educational subjects and include science kits, arts and crafts kits, robotics kits, and more.
4M offers a wide range of toys and kits to let you build a clock, crochet a placemat, or turn your room into a planetarium--all in the name of making learning fun.
Kit includes two crochet hooks, one plastic needle, 7 colors of yarn
Enough materials to make 3 of these items; coaster, handbag, placemat or belt
Recommended for ages 8 years and up
